TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WSSecurityBasedCredentials extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeCredentials
Public MustInherit Class WSSecurityBasedCredentials Inherits ExchangeCredentials

Docs.summary: The base class for all credential classes that use Web Services Security (WS-Security).

remarks.para: For more information about Web Services Security, see the Web Services Security Specifications Index Page
